string.name: name
string.value: Corruption of Morals: Strong Stone Goblin
#p9000072# at the #b#m950100000##k looks very upset. What could be the problem? Talk to #b#p9000072##k.

#p9000072# says that the influx of tourists has corrupted the morals and culture of the village. As evidence, he mentioned the outfit of the #o9500389#s. #p9000072# said that he can no longer put up with the #r#o9500389#s#k walking around in their revealing underwear and asked that you eliminate them. Enter the Goblin Cave by talking to #b#p9000075##k. \n\n#o9500389##r #a105881##k
You eliminated the #o9500389#s, but #p9000072# is worried that #bin just 1 hour#k, they will return again as they were before. Come back later to help #p9000072#.

How could this be?! How could this have happened in the #m950100000#? This is all because of #p9000078#, whose idea was to develop #m950100000# into a tourist attraction. Look at all those tourists who've come at his beckoning! What? You want to know what I'm talking about?

All those tourists are corrupting the morals and culture of the holy #m950100000#! I have evidence... Just take a look at the outfit of those #o9500389#s! They are so vulgar... I can't stand looking at them! Something must be done now!

Oh, so you'll help? It's good to know that there are some sensible ones even amongst the outsiders... In that case, I won't refuse your help. Please go defeat #r200#k of those lewd #r#o9500389#s#k! You can get to the Goblin Cave by talking to #b#p9000075##k!
Fine. I guess I better tell #p9000078# to stop allowing tourists to enter. Then I'll have to deal with the #o9500389#s myself!
Oh! It looks you've returned from eliminating the #o9500389#s! Thanks to you, the town seems to have somewhat returned to normalcy.

But those #o9500389#s are so persistent that they will probably return to normal once an hour has passed. I would like to ask the same favor of you again at that time. Please come back to me after #b1 hour#k has passed.

Have you not defeated the #r200 #o9500389#s#ks yet? Then again, it must be pretty hard to do while looking at their vulgar outfits... Still, this is a very important matter. Please talk to #b#p9000075##k and enter the Goblin Cave.
